title: Top-Rated Swan Valley Winery Escape with Daily Breakfast & A$65 Dining Credit
description:
Immerse yourself in the world of wine with an ultra-luxe stay at The Colony at Mandoon Estate - a modern oasis in Western Australia’s enchanting Swan Valley, only a 30-minute drive from Perth. Offering award-winning wines, an abundance of local produce, striking natural beauty and decades of history, this is an indulgent escape from the city.

Fusing modern luxury, old vines and fine wines, Mandoon Estate is home to an exceptional fine-dining restaurant, its own craft brewery and a spectacular cellar door offering a variety of exciting tastings. A stay at this vine-laced retreat comes with endless opportunities for new experiences: challenge your palate with an interactive winemaking class, learn about local Indigenous produce from a Noongar Elder or take in the serenity on a relaxing Swan Valley cruise. Stamped with a Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice 2021 badge, The Colony at Mandoon Estate is rated among the top 10% of properties worldwide on the review site.

**Your** **handpicked inclusions:**

- Begin each day with a delicious breakfast for two in the relaxed atmosphere of Homestead Brewery
- Treat yourself with A$65 food and drinks credit per package
- Enjoy a final morning of serenity with guaranteed 12pm checkout

**Suite Upgrade:** Looking for something extra special? Upgrade to the contemporary 42sqm Executive Suite, featuring an airy mezzanine bedroom, spacious sitting area and a private balcony overlooking the Swan River.

**This deal has NO surcharges:** Travel any time for the same great price.
